groupdesc: Configure the groups of shortcodes which will be active.

fields.name: shortcodes1_state
fields.label: Typography elements
fields.tooltip: This group of shortcodes contains such typography elements as lists, icons, and floated blocks.

fields.name: shortcodes2_state
fields.label: Interactive elements
fields.tooltip: This group of shortcodes contains all elements connected with user interactions.

fields.name: shortcodes3_state
fields.label: Theme-specific elements
fields.tooltip: This group of shortcodes contains elements custom-prepared for a specific theme.
